sentences.en: Every eventuality is covered, from running out of petrol to needing water.
sentences.cn: 从汽油耗尽到用水紧缺，所有可能发生的事情都考虑到了。

sentences.en: I first started cruising in yachts with temperamental petrol engines.
sentences.cn: 我刚开始驾驶游艇航行时，艇上的汽油发动机老出毛病。

sentences.en: Motorists will be rationed to thirty litres of petrol a month.
sentences.cn: 汽车司机每月的油量将限定为30升。

sentences.en: Tell Mac to siphon petrol out of his wagon.
sentences.cn: 让马克把他车里的汽油抽出来。

sentences.en: The boom of the 1980s led to a taste for petrol-guzzling cars.
sentences.cn: 20世纪80年代的经济繁荣使人们喜欢上高油耗的汽车。

sentences.en: The car was doused in petrol and set alight.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车被浇上汽油点燃了。

sentences.en: The crowds became violent and threw petrol bombs at the police.
sentences.cn: 人群变得狂暴起来，并向警察投掷汽油弹。

sentences.en: The economic affairs minister announced limits on petrol sales.
sentences.cn: 经济部长宣布了对石油销售的限制。

sentences.en: The price of petrol is coming down by four pence a gallon.
sentences.cn: 汽油的价格每加仑降了4便士。

sentences.en: There are already long queues of vehicles at petrol pumps.
sentences.cn: 加油泵边车辆已经排起了长队。

sentences.en: They chip in for the petrol and food.
sentences.cn: 他们凑钱买汽油和食物。

sentences.en: They hurled abuse at their victim as they doused him with petrol.
sentences.cn: 他们一边大声辱骂这名受害者一边将汽油淋在他身上。

sentences.en: This tax would raise petrol prices by about 3.5p per litre.
sentences.cn: 这项税收会使每升汽油价格提高约3.5便士。

sentences.en: Your engine can run happily on 76 octane petrol.
sentences.cn: 你的发动机很适合烧76号辛烷汽油。

phrases.tran_cn: 汽油发动机；汽油机；柴油引擎

trans.tran_en: a liquid obtained from  petroleum  that is used to supply power to the engine of cars and other vehicles
